title: Bronze/Silver Players Looking To Duo?
body:
Hey all,

Just looking for some fellow bronze players or silver players to duo with. I'm currently Bronze 1 in promos for Silver.

replies.body: B4 adc main would love to play with you guys. I main Jihn, ezreal and Lucian but can play cait, sivir, vayne to a reasonable standard.
Hit me up, I'm supp main (almost all supp) and i can play jg tank as well. I'm in S5 now (climb from b2) and i want to help people who have been in the same boat as me :)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
Hit me up 2! we'll have a 5 man team if you add us all.

Hey hit me up, I'm a jungle main but I can play any roles except for support pretty decent. I'm currently B3 but been to silver promos. Just having bad luck with my ranked matches atm.

IGN-Salyer
Carry me senpai :^) Currently Bronze 2 with 0 LP because I seem to be very unlucky with my ranked matches
